about_the_game:
Gameplay

Clean Stack is a little puzzle game that involves stacking odd-sized objects with fun physics without making anything touch the ground. There are lots of different objects, which creates some bizarre situations. You'll also need to use potions on the objects to get through the levels, which makes the game even more challenging!

About Clean Stack

Clean Stack is a extended version of a game made in the GMTK 2024 gamejam. The game is way longer with a bunch of new mechanics. The game has been designed to provide a pleasant, relaxing experience while retaining some challenge. In addition, there is more bananas.

Key Features:

  • its literally FREE

  • 65 levels

  • Around 3-4 hours of gameplay

  • A ton of fun and weird achievements

  • 25+ differents items to play with

  • 6 potions to make chaotic situations

  • A silly blue monster to annoy guide you though the game

  • An hard difficulty gamemode

  • Bananas

  • And all the passion of a person in their creation

  • Bananas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.5GHZ +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MD VRAM Intel HD 4000 / GeForce 200 Series / Radeon HD 4000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
